title: Avast! Premier Antivirus [2016] 11.2.2262 Final By Sirine
description:
Software version: 2016 01.11.2245
Official website: link
Language: English, Russian, and others

December 1, 2015 were made available the final version of AVAST 2016 SP1 - build number 1.11.2245.

The main changes.
Added option to disable signatures in e-mail in Settings -> General;
SafeZone Browser now automatically imports the bookmarks and passwords from an old SafeZone;
Added SafeZone icon in the menu system tray;
Added icon for scanners;
Scanning now supports HTTPS protocol SPDY;
Fixed issue with browsers in Windows XP;
Fixed problems with expired certificates needed to scan HTTPS;
The pop-up update notification does not show when testing the latest version;
Fixed missed the option to remove a sample scan profile;
Fixed the wrong text displayed in the menu;
Problems with SecureDNS;
Fixed missing Spanish component "Secure your home network."

Additionally:
In the folder there are files with the release of the license until 2016 and 2021, and the utility to remove Avast antivirus cleaner.

Additional Information:
